summary: Completed testing of fuzzy search spell correction and reduced padding features. All 11 backend tests passed. Frontend spell suggestion UI working correctly. Compound pages display with reduced padding for fast scroll friendly UI.
passed_tests: API /api/pubmed/search - misspelled 'curcuminn' returns suggestion 'curcumin'
API /api/pubmed/search - misspelled 'ashwaghanda' returns suggestion 'ashwagandha'
API /api/pubmed/search - misspelled 'turmric' returns suggestion 'turmeric'
API /api/pubmed/search - misspelled 'ginsng' returns suggestion 'ginseng'
API /api/pubmed/search - correct spelling 'curcumin' returns no suggestion
API /api/pubmed/search - correct spelling 'ashwagandha' returns no suggestion
API /api/pubmed/search - response structure includes 'suggestion' field
API /api/pubmed/search - empty query returns no suggestion
API /api/pubmed/search - short query (<3 chars) returns no suggestion
API /api/pubmed/search - search with study_type filter works
API /api/pubmed/search - search with date filter works
Frontend: Spell suggestion 'Did you mean: curcumin?' appears for 'curcuminn'
Frontend: Spell suggestion 'Did you mean: ashwagandha?' appears for 'ashwaghanda'
Frontend: Clicking spell suggestion updates search query and performs new search
Frontend: Suggestion disappears after clicking (correct spelling has no suggestion)
Frontend: /compounds page loads with reduced padding
Frontend: /compounds hero section has compact py-8 lg:py-12 padding
Frontend: /compounds compound cards have compact p-4 padding
Frontend: /compounds filters section has compact p-2 padding
Frontend: /compound/gotu-kola page loads with reduced padding
Frontend: /compound/gotu-kola stats card has compact p-4 padding
Frontend: /compound/gotu-kola safety notes section has compact padding
Frontend: /compounds search functionality works after padding reduction
Frontend: /compounds navigation to compound detail pages works
Frontend: /compound pages 'View All Studies' button works
critical_code_review_comments: Spell correction uses 'thefuzz' library with medical terms dictionary for fuzzy matching
Suggestions only appear when results are under 50 or when there are no results
Fuzzy matching score threshold is 60-95 to avoid suggesting identical or very different words
Padding reduction applied consistently across hero sections (py-16 lg:py-24 -> py-8 lg:py-12), cards (p-6 -> p-4), and various UI elements
context_for_next_testing_agent: Fuzzy search spell correction feature fully tested. Backend uses 'thefuzz' library with MEDICAL_TERMS_DICTIONARY. Frontend displays 'Did you mean: [suggestion]?' with clickable link. Reduced padding applied to /compounds and /compound/:id pages for fast scroll friendly UI on laptops.

compounds_page.grid_gaps: gap-2 to gap-3 (was gap-4 to gap-6)
